name: The Gloom of Oakwell
description:
The Gloom of Oakwell is an RPG/shoot-em-up heavily inspired by Vampire Survivor, 20 Minutes Till Dawn, and classic fantasy TTRPGs like D&D and Pathfinder.

This is the first game I've made, so I hope you enjoy and have fun!

Please let me know if you have suggestions, stumbled into a bug, or are interested in seeing more. I plan to have more updates to flesh out the story a bit more, as well as add more chapters.

Summary

An archer named Rina seeks refuge from the demonic fog, the Gloom, in the small town of Oakwell. Employed by the town's alchemist Lydia, he hunts demons each night to protect the townsfolk. However, as the demons get stronger each night, Rina with the help of the townsfolk must find the source of the magic.

Credits

Created by and art by Mich Hu.

Music from Bardify.

Made using Pygame.
